name: Salesmate Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Salesmate Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Salesmate API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Salesmate API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: activity

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many deals

owner.name: owner
owner.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
owner.natural_language_description: 参数名: Owner Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

rawData.name: rawData
rawData.description: Whether the data should include the fields details
rawData.natural_language_description: 参数名: RAW Data | 作用: Whether the data should include the fields details | 默认值: False

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: description (值: None) - This field contains details related to the deal
tags (值: None) - This field contains tags associated with an deal
primaryCompany (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

id.name: id
id.description: If more than one deal add them separated by ,
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal ID | 作用: If more than one deal add them separated by , | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: owner (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
primaryContact (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
description (值: None) - This field contains details related to the deal
tags (值: None) - This field contains tags associated with an deal
primaryCompany (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 10

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - Comma-separated list of fields to return
sortBy (值: None) - The field to sort by

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

type.name: type
type.description: This field displays activity type such as call, meeting etc
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: This field displays activity type such as call, meeting etc | (必填项)

primaryContact.name: primaryContact
primaryContact.description: Primary contact for the deal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
primaryContact.natural_language_description: 参数名: Primary Contact Name or ID | 作用: Primary contact for the deal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

status.name: status
status.natural_language_description: 参数名: Status | 默认值: Open | (必填项)
